ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ â€œTAX THE JEWSâ€ CHANTED AT SAN FRANCISCO MAYORâ€™S EVENT At a press conference by Daniel Lurie, Mayor of San Francisco, protesters shifted from chanting â€œtax the richâ€ to shouting: â€œTax the Jews.â€ The disruption occurred during a tax reform announcement. The Democratic Socialists of America chapter present denied the individual was affiliated with them.
